extension.name: System - HD-OG
extension.author: Hyde-Design
extension.description: HD-OG enables you to integrate your Joomla website into the Open Graph Protocol (Facebook's social search engine). Use the Facebook URL linter at http://developers.facebook.com/tools/lint/ to test the validity of the data. For more information on the Open Graph Protocol visit http://ogp.me/

field.name: disable_in
field.label: Disable in
field.description: Choose the components to disable this plugin.Please write like this : com_k2 or like this (with more then one, separated by comma and without spaces): com_k2,com_jdownloads

field.name: title_core
field.description: Basic data required by Open Graph Protocol.

field.name: hdog_image
field.label: Select an image
field.description: Select a default thumbnail image. For best use the image should be at least 200px in both dimensions.

field.name: hdog_fbappid
field.label: Define a FB APP ID
field.description: Put here your FB APP ID.To find APP ID : Create a new APP in https://developers.facebook.com/quickstarts/?platform=web

field.name: title_admin
field.description: Only required for testing with Facebook APIs URL linter.

field.name: hdog_admins
field.label: Admin ID
field.description: Enter your Facebook Profile number here (the nine digit id number displayed in the URL of your Facebook's profile page). Note: This is only required for the Facebook URL linter to work, it is not required for anything other than admin testing.
